name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Shape Shifter (Bug)
description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a cultivator who longs to revive the ancient mysteries of Abundance, and to guide the Xianzhou natives back on the liberating path of immortality.
Now, their wish has been fulfilled. Gifted by the power of the ancient miracle and using it as both weapon and armor, they managed to touch on the secret of immortality.

skills.name: Thunder-Shock
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Punishing Bolts
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target and adjacent units.

skills.name: Thudding Calamity
skills.description: Deals massive Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Sympathicus
skills.description: Consumes this unit's own HP to summon Mara-Struck Soldier and Disciples of Sanctus Medicus: Internal Alchemist. At the same time, lock on to the target with the lowest current HP percentage and make all friendly units focus their attacks on this target.

skills.name: Vigor Draining
skills.description: While there are other friendly units with Rebirth on the field, this unit will possess Draining Hit. When hitting a target, this unit will restore HP.
